00011 /**
00012 * @brief Initializator of Spinevolution class.
00013 * @param filename Name of the file to write into.
00014 * @param model The model which the data will be extracted.
00015 */
00016 void SpinEvolution::Initialize_SpinEvolution(Model^ model, String^ filename)
00017 {
00018         SystemModel=model;
00019         TitleFile=filename;
00020 
00021         String^ temp=gcnew String("");                  //channel strings
00022         String^ ChannelList=gcnew String("");   //Total channels string
00023         int j=0;
00024 
00025         //Creating channel list and dtagrid with channels
00026         for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys) 
00027         {
00028                 //Create the channel string from the elements and mass 
00029                 temp=" "+((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element+
00030                         ((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass;
00031 
00032                 //Check if does not exist already
00033                 if(!ChannelList->Contains(temp)) 
00034                 {
00035                         //Add line in the datagridview and fill the line with the channel string
00036                         ChanneldataGridView->Rows->Add();
00037                         ChanneldataGridView[1,j]->Value=temp;
00038                         ChanneldataGridView[0,j]->Value=true;
00039                         j++;
00040 
00041                         //Add the channel string in the total channels string 
00042                         ChannelList+=temp;
00043                 };
00044         };
00045 }

00047 /**
00048 * @brief Function for writing in the file all the data.
00049 * @param filename Name of the file to write into.
00050 */
00051 void SpinEvolution::WriteFile(System::String^ filename)
00052 {
00053         //Create and open the file
00054         WritingFile=gcnew FileStream(filename,FileMode::Create);
00055 
00056         //Euler angles object, values and isotropic, anisotropic etc
00057         EulerAngles^ euleran;
00058         double alpha, beta, gamma;
00059         double iso, aniso, hta;
00060 
00061         String ^ FileText=gcnew String(""); //The Text written in the file
00062 
00063         //Some signature staff
00064         FileText="* Produced by Spinach GUI "+ SpinachGUIver+" \n";
00065         FileText+="*--------------------------------------------------------------------\n";
00066         FileText+="*System Name:"+TitleFile+" \n";
00067         FileText+="**A basic SpinEvolution simulation route is appended after \n";
00068         FileText+="**'The System' section with random values.\n";
00069         FileText+="**Please edit as appropriate for your specific case.\n";
00070         FileText+="*--------------------------------------------------------------------\n";
00071         FileText+="****** The System *******\n";
00072         FileText+="spectrometer(MHz)  500\n";
00073         FileText+="spinning_freq(kHz) 10.0\n";
00074 
00075         //Print Atoms
00076         String^ AtomList=gcnew String("");
00077         String^ IndexList=gcnew String("");
00078         String^ SpinachGUIIndex=gcnew String("");
00079         String^ ChannelList=gcnew String("");
00080         String^ temp=gcnew String("");
00081         String^ temp2=gcnew String("");
00082         Dictionary <int, int>^ AtomIDs=gcnew Dictionary<int, int>();
00083         ArrayList^ SortedAtomList=gcnew ArrayList();
00084         AtomsDictionary^ AtomCollection=gcnew AtomsDictionary(SystemModel->InteractionCollection);
00085         int j=1;
00086 
00087         //First add atoms in a new array
00088         for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys) 
00089         {
00090                 SortedAtomList->Add(((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i]));
00091         };
00092 
00093         //Sorting according to element name
00094         AtomCollection=SystemModel->AtomCollection;
00095 
00096         //Loop over all channels
00097         for(int i=0;i<ChanneldataGridView->Rows->Count;i++) 
00098         { 
00099                 //Write in the channel list anly the ones that are on
00100                 if(Convert::ToInt32(ChanneldataGridView[0,i]->Value)) ChannelList+=ChanneldataGridView[1,i]->Value;
00101         }
00102 
00103         //Loop over all atoms except electrons
00104         for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys) 
00105         {
00106                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element!="e" &&
00107                         ChannelList->Contains(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass))
00108                 {
00109                         //Create a string with mass number and element, and add in the atomList
00110                         temp=" "+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element+
00111                                 ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass;
00112                         AtomList+=temp;
00113 
00114 
00115                         //Create spaced String with the same length as the Atom
00116                         temp2 = gcnew String(" ",0, temp->Length);
00117                         temp2=temp2->Insert(1, Convert::ToString(j));
00118                         IndexList+=temp2->Remove(temp->Length); //Reduced it to original size
00119 
00120                         //Similarly for writing SpinachGUI Indexes
00121                         temp2 = gcnew String(" ",0, temp->Length);
00122                         temp2=temp2->Insert(1, Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID));
00123                         SpinachGUIIndex+=temp2->Remove(temp->Length); //Reduced it to original size
00124 
00125                         //Try to save a list of all unique IDs
00126                         try 
00127                         {
00128                                 AtomIDs->Add(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID, j++);
00129                         }
00130                         catch (ArgumentException^)
00131                         {
00132                                 MessageBox::Show("AtomID declared twice", "Error", 
00133                                         MessageBoxButtons::OK, MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00134                         };
00135                 };
00136         };
00137 
00138         //Write all the above in the stream in the correct format
00139         FileText+="channels          "+ChannelList+"\n";
00140         FileText+="nuclei            "+AtomList+"\n";
00141         FileText+="atomic_coords      ";
00142 
00143         //If more than one atom loop over all atoms and write them
00144         if(AtomCollection->Count==1) FileText+="*";
00145         else 
00146                 for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys)  FileText+= ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->X+" "+
00147                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Y+" "+ ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Z+" ";
00148 
00149         FileText+="\n";
00150 
00151         //Print Interactions
00152         String ^ CSIsotropic=gcnew String("");
00153         String ^ ChemicalShift=gcnew String("");
00154         String ^ JCoupling=gcnew String("");
00155         String ^ Quadrupolar=gcnew String("");
00156         String ^ A=gcnew String("");
00157         String ^ B=gcnew String("");
00158 
00159         //Loop over all interactions
00160         for each(int i in SystemModel->InteractionCollection->Keys) 
00161         {
00162                 //Short name for the A Atom string
00163                 A=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Element+
00164                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Mass;
00165 
00166                 //Short name for the B Atom string
00167                 if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B!=nullptr)
00168                         B=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->isotope->Element+
00169                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->isotope->Mass;
00170                 else B="dummy";
00171 
00172                 //For Chemical shifts, jcouplings and quadropolar interactions and when channel is activated
00173                 if((((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Shift ||
00174                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling||
00175                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar) &&
00176                         ChannelList->Contains(A))
00177                 {
00178                         //Calculate euler angles object form this function
00179                         euleran=EulerAnglesfromEigenVectors(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->dcm);
00180 
00181                         //Convert angles to degrees 
00182                         alpha=float(180.0f*euleran->alpha/PI);
00183                         beta=float(180.0f*euleran->beta/PI);
00184                         gamma=float(180.0f*euleran->gamma/PI);
00185 
00186                         //Isotorpic Factor
00187                         iso=(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[0]+
00188                                 ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[1]+
00189                                 ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[2])/3.0f;
00190 
00191                         double yy=1000000.0f,xx,zz=iso;
00192                         //Find from abs(s_zz-s_iso)>=abs(s_xx-s_iso)>=abs(s_yy-s_iso)
00193                         for(int jj=0;jj<3;jj++)
00194                         {
00195                                 if(abs(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]-iso)>=abs(zz-iso))
00196                                         zz=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00197                                 if(abs(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]-iso)<=abs(yy-iso))
00198                                         yy=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00199                         };
00200                         for(int jj=0;jj<3;jj++)
00201                         {
00202                                 if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]!=zz &&
00203                                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]!=yy)
00204                                         xx=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00205                         };
00206 
00207                         //Anisotorpic Factor etc
00208                         aniso=zz-iso;
00209                         if(abs(aniso)<1.0e-10) aniso=hta=0.0f;
00210                         else hta=(yy-xx)/aniso;
00211 
00212                         //Write Chemical shift in appropriate format
00213                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Shift)
00214                         {
00215                                 CSIsotropic+=To_String(iso)+" ";
00216                                 ChemicalShift+="csa_parameters     "+AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+
00217                                         " "+To_String(aniso)+" "+To_String(hta)+" "+
00218                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" ppm \n";
00219                         };
00220 
00221                         //Write J-coupling in appropriate format
00222                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling
00223                                 && ChannelList->Contains(B))
00224                         {
00225                                 JCoupling+="j_coupling         "+
00226                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00227                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID]+" "+
00228                                         To_String(iso)+" "+ To_String(aniso)+" "+To_String(hta)+" "+
00229                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \n";
00230                         };
00231 
00232                         //Write Quadrupolar coupling in appropriate format
00233                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00234                         {
00235                                 Quadrupolar+="quadrupole         "+
00236                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00237                                         To_String(aniso)+" "+
00238                                         To_String(hta)+" "+
00239                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \n";
00240                         };
00241                 }       
00242         };
00243 
00244         //Write all the above in the stream in the correct format
00245         FileText+="cs_isotropic       "+(CSIsotropic->Length>1 ? CSIsotropic+" ppm" : "*")+" \n";
00246         FileText+=(ChemicalShift->Length>1 ? ChemicalShift : "csa_parameters     * \n");
00247         FileText+=(JCoupling->Length>1 ? JCoupling : "j_coupling         * \n");
00248         FileText+=(Quadrupolar->Length>1 ? Quadrupolar : "quadrupole         * \n");
00249 
00250         //This is a basic Spinevolution parameters
00251         FileText+="dip_switchboard    *\n";
00252         FileText+="csa_switchboard    *\n";
00253         FileText+="exchange_nuclei    *\n";
00254         FileText+="bond_len_nuclei    *\n";
00255         FileText+="bond_ang_nuclei    *\n";
00256         FileText+="tors_ang_nuclei    *\n";
00257         FileText+="groups_nuclei      *\n";
00258 
00259         //Printing of the pulse sequence according to the channels we have activated
00260         FileText+="******* Pulse Sequence ******************************\n";
00261         int jj=1;
00262         for(int i=0;i<ChanneldataGridView->Rows->Count;i++) 
00263         {
00264                 if(ChannelList->Contains(Convert::ToString(ChanneldataGridView[1,i]->Value)))
00265                 {
00266                         FileText+="CHN "+jj+"\n";
00267                         FileText+="timing(usec)       (4   4)\n";
00268                         FileText+="power(kHz)         125 125\n";  
00269                         FileText+="phase(deg)         0   15\n"; 
00270                         FileText+="freq_offs(kHz)     0   0\n";
00271                         jj++;
00272                 };
00273         };
00274 
00275         //This is a basic Spinevolution parameters which append at the end of our data in order to run in the SpinEvolution  
00276         FileText+="******* Variables ***********************************\n";
00277         FileText+="******* Options *************************************\n";
00278         FileText+="rho0               F1x\n";
00279         FileText+="observables        F1p\n";
00280         FileText+="EulerAngles        *\n";
00281         FileText+="n_gamma            *\n";
00282         FileText+="line_broaden(Hz)   *\n";
00283         FileText+="zerofill           *\n";
00284         FileText+="FFT_dimensions     *\n";
00285         FileText+="options            *\n";
00286         FileText+="******************************************************\n";
00287 
00288         //Convert and write to the file      
00289         array<Byte>^ info = (gcnew UTF8Encoding( true ))->GetBytes(FileText);
00290         WritingFile->Write( info, 0, info->Length  );
00291         WritingFile->Close();
00292 }

00294 /**
00295 * @brief EventHandler for opening the save dialoguebox and  writing the stream to file.
00296 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00297 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00298 */
00299 Void SpinEvolution::Exportbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00300 {
00301         //Setting the format and initila filename for the save dialoguebox 
00302         saveFileDialog->Filter="SpinEvolution File|*.in";
00303         saveFileDialog->FileName=Path::GetFileNameWithoutExtension(TitleFile)+".in";
00304 
00305         //Opens the save dialogue box and check if the OK button clicked then save to file
00306         if (saveFileDialog->ShowDialog() == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::OK )
00307                 WriteFile(saveFileDialog->FileName);
00308 }
